actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the act of July 7, 1970 (84 Stat. 409) to authorize appropriations to the Secretary of the Interior without reference to the agencies involved.

summary.text: Authorizes the appropriation of $22,774,000 (January 1969 prices) to the Secretary of the Interior for construction of the works involved in the Touchet division, Walla Walla project, Oregon-Washington, approved July 7, 1970.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of July 7, 1970 (84 Stat. 409) to authorize appropriations to the Secretary of the Interior without reference to the agencies involved.
